features: Main body fabrics are bluesign® approved, made with 100% post-consumer recycled fabrics, and treated with a ﬂuorocarbon-free water repellant coating (C0 DWR).
NFC chip technology provides last and found capability, tracking travel, and rewards with travel
Carry-ons feature key fob, 15” laptop sleeve and attachment toggles to secure an organizer panel
Central Lock Point and lockable zippers allow multiple compartments to be secured
Front padded zip pocket stores last-minute items
Maximize space inside main compartment with Pack-It™ organization
Wheeled bag features zip-away suspension with breathable pack straps and back panel for maximum carry versatility
Breathable perforated foam backpack straps feature adjustable sternum strap and safety whistle with padded tuck-away hip belt
Pack straps feature adjustable sternum strap with safety whistle
Koala carry straps allow you to secure the daypack to your front for close-to-body security
Oversized oﬀ-road wheels have a big tire for multi-terrain expeditions
Impact-resistant handle system zips away for protection when checking
Zip-oﬀ Daypack features zippered mesh pocket with key fob, 15” laptop sleeve, attachment toggles and is hydration bladder compatible
